Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: I will hold off on adding a Hash function to this package and instead use the core/util one, until we reach consensus here: https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-887?focusedCommentId=19743&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-19743
